name: Animal Paradise Wild
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Now is your chance to raise baby animals in a wild safari adventure! In Animal Paradise Wild, care for young animals by feeding, training, and playing with them. Roam through the savanna, the jungle, and other native habitats while snapping photos of your new animal friends. Best a monkey in rock-paper-scissors, play whack-a-mole with meerkats, or try your hand at other mini-games featuring your favorite wild animals.
